definition: to giggle/to laugh foolishly/to smirk/to simper

sentences.english: My neighbor giggled in embarrassment, looking at the table like I did.
sentences.chinese: 我的邻座局促不安地傻笑着，跟我一样盯着桌子看。

sentences.english: I don't know why you smirked.
sentences.chinese: 我不懂你为什么要傻笑。

sentences.english: Jamie glowered at his smirking brother.
sentences.chinese: 吉米生气地瞪着正在傻笑的哥哥。

sentences.english: Never thought their women had giggly little charm.
sentences.chinese: 从未想到他们的女人有傻笑的小巧的魅力。

sentences.english: The drums sounded and instead of following the commands, the girls simply giggled and blushed.
sentences.chinese: 战鼓敲响了，但女孩们没有服从命令，只是脸红傻笑。

sentences.english: Laughter on American television has taken the place of the chorus in Greek tragedy. ---J. Baudrillard.
sentences.chinese: 没过电视里的傻笑已经取代了希腊悲剧里的合唱。

sentences.english: Miaka and Taka looked at each other and giggled .
sentences.chinese: 美朱和魏看着对方，傻笑起来。

sentences.english: Some candidates giggled nervously as they waited for the interview.
sentences.chinese: 一些应聘者在等待面试的时候紧张的傻笑。

sentences.english: He was so embarrassed by the question, he tittered .
sentences.chinese: 他被问得不知所措地傻笑著。

sentences.english: She wasn’t so giggly anymore and she had never looked better.
sentences.chinese: 她不再动辄傻笑而且看上去从没有这么完美。

sentences.english: Cut to Ross emerging from a hallway, grinning inanely.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯从过道出现，傻笑着。

sentences.english: I tried to calm him down, but he just looked at me and smirked.
sentences.chinese: 我试图让他冷静下来，但是他只是看着我傻笑。

sentences.english: When I help her in the shower, we have such a giggle.
sentences.chinese: 我帮她洗澡的时候，我们都傻笑了。
她的傻笑刺激他的神经。

sentences.english: Zishu emphasize back to barracks, like ice, smirking.
sentences.chinese: 子书回到军营，想起喜冰，傻笑不已。

sentences.english: Then he hugged Yinling tightly in his arms while Yinling giggled continuously.
sentences.chinese: 于是他把她紧紧地抱在怀中而婴宁也傻笑个不停。

definition: to laugh heartily/to burst into loud laughter
to give a hollow laugh/to force a smile/forced laugh/CL:聲|声[sheng1]
to stare blankly/to be stunned/to be lost in thought
